__e: Rights to Access, Rectification, Cancellation and Opposition
In accordance with Articles 38 and 40 of French Law 2004-801 of 06/08/2004, you have a right to access, modify, or delete data about you.
2. RIGHT OF ACCESS, CORRECTION, DELETION AND OPPOSITION

In accordance with the law "Informatique et Libertés" of January 6, 1978, you have a right of access, rectification, modification and deletion of the data that concern you. You can exercise this right by contacting us by e-mail.
At any time you can exercise your rights to access, rectify, update and delete your personal data. To do this, send us an email to geral@solubag.pt.
In accordance with Articles 38 and 40 of French Law 2004-801 of 06/08/2004, you have a right to access, modify, or delete data about you.
We will not communicate your information to anybody in view to keep your pricay. Forward to the french law you can modify your information at us.

Under the French law on Information Technology and Civil Liberties (Informatique et Libertés) of 6 January 1978, you have the right to access, change, correct and delete your personal data. Please use the on-line form below to request this right.
(Data protection : In accordance with the « French data protection » act of January 6th 1978, you have the right to access, modify, correct and delete any of your information)
As part of the General Data Protection Regulation of 27 April 2016, every European citizen has the right to access, rectify and delete personal data collected by a company.
